Key Match Events: Aaron Judge hit a home run in the game
José Ramírez blasted a solo home run in the 9th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The three biggest hitters for the Yankees have homered in the first two games
Others: The Guardians fell 6-3 on Tuesday in Game 2
The Yankees took a commanding lead in the series with a 2-0 lead
Gerrit Cole finished after 4 1/3 innings pitched, allowing two earned runs on six hits and an uncharacteristic four walks while fanning four batters
The Guardians' bats came alive by sticking to their patient, contact-oriented game plan
The Guardians' defense took advantage of poor baserunning by the Yankees in the 6th inning
The series shifts back to Cleveland for Game 3
